Services

Class MapService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Services.MapService

  • public class MapService
extends java.lang.Object
    The MapService class load, read, parse, edit, and save map file.

      • editMap

        public void editMap(GameState p_gameState,
                    java.lang.String p_editFilePath)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Method is responsible for creating a new map if map to be edited does not exists, and if it exists it parses the map file to game state object.
        Parameters:
        p_gameState - GameState model class object
        p_editFilePath - consists of base filepath
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - triggered in case the file does not exist or the file name is invalid

      • editContinent

        public void editContinent(GameState p_gameState,
                          java.lang.String p_argument,
                          java.lang.String p_operation)
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          InvalidMap
        Processing of Continents given in commands which are to be added or removed from selected map though editmap.
        Parameters:
        p_gameState - GameState model class object
        p_argument - the argument fetched from the given command
        p_operation - the operation to be performed as given by the user
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - triggered in case the file does not exist or the file name is invalid
        InvalidMap - invalidmap exception
